entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low zero except minus 4 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Drizzle or flurries changing to flurries this evening and ending overnight then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 early this evening then light late this evening. Low zero except minus 4 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 6 May 2023
